title: STREET HYPNOSIS FOR WELL BEING / DR. MARCO PARET'S MASTERCLASS  IN RUSSIA
description:
Non-verbal hypnosis can be done everywhere, even on the street. In this video, Dr. Paret will demonstrate you a powerful non-verbal streethypnosis. These images are from one of his recent masterclasses in Russia, where he taught his students the most unique ancient techniques, such as Fascination, Mesmerism and more. The subject felt very relaxed during the hypnotic experience and after waking up, she felt a deep positive change. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
